channel.title: Regen-X Oldschool Pk server. -------[317]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2r5eywj.png[/img] Are you looking for that 317 eco with friendly players, bossing, no downtime, deep wildy pking, and dicing? Well I think you might of found it, it has that old new feel. Strong eco, bossing like avatars, sea troll queen, godwars, barrows etc. You get the point. Main thing, is its dedicated owners, how are continuously updating the game, keeping it fresh. Deep wildy pking is strong because some bosses in wildy, which causes team pking, hunting and escaping. [b] YOU WILL ENJOY[/b]
[b]QuickLinks[/b] [url=http://www.regen-x.org/]Home[/url] [url=http://www.regen-x.org/forum/]Forums[/url] [url=http://www.regen-x.org/forum/misc.php?page=Play]Play [/url]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/28wkrgh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2eauoi9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/ulm9w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/wrnbpx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/23ku8lu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/rub3g6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2eamn2x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2hhouat.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2aahwn8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/sxjfps.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2q9b09f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/nbc1dv.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Regen-X Oldschool Pk server. -------[317]
item.dc:creator: @Radiance Radiance
item.description:
@Radiance wrote:

Chachai:

It is oldschool though…

It has the oldschool idea, but the new animations and the graphics make it a hybrid which means it is not oldschool. You have the right idea though, but work to achieve that and look into some things if you really want oldschool.

Read full topic

item.title: Regen-X Oldschool Pk server. -------[317]
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:13, topic:543343”][quote author=Chachai link=topic=662220.msg4426840#msg4426840 date=1401242029]
you guys are taking it way to serious. Yes its a 474 loading yes 525 pvp armours. It’s still oldschool, and this is what the community wanted. I don’t see why everyone just has to comment shit, like keep it to yourself?
[/quote]
Wait, a 474 loading 525? Are you sure not a 317 loading 525? Because a pure 474, the client hasn’t been discovered enough to be loading custom models.[/quote]
Give this man a medal.

Read full topic

you guys are taking it way to serious. Yes its a 474 loading yes 525 pvp armours. It’s still oldschool, and this is what the community wanted. I don’t see why everyone just has to comment shit, like keep it to yourself?

you guys are taking it way to serious. Yes its a 474 loading yes 525 pvp armours. It’s still oldschool, and this is what the community wanted. I don’t see why everyone just has to comment shit, like keep it to yourself?

And maybe you aren’t taking it serious enough?

item.title: Regen-X Oldschool Pk server. -------[317]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:543343”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=662220.msg4426816#msg4426816 date=1401235411]
It has new gear such as vesta’s. 317 didn’t have that crap, so no you’re just using the 317 revision. I’ll never understand why people want to use this revision then pump it full of new school content.
[/quote]
It’s one of the most documented revisions we have. Also, since there are so many people using it, there are lots of tools and such that make editing it such a breeze. So a lot stay back on the older revision client for the ease of use, but they still like the new content so they add it in.[/quote]
474 is really complete, believe it or not.

The vesta and stuff was like 525. I’m pretty sure the amount we know about 525 is enough for this dude who is hosting this server.

Read full topic

item.title: Regen-X Oldschool Pk server. -------[317]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Elrick:

It has new gear such as vesta’s. 317 didn’t have that crap, so no you’re just using the 317 revision. I’ll never understand why people want to use this revision then pump it full of new school content.

It’s one of the most documented revisions we have. Also, since there are so many people using it, there are lots of tools and such that make editing it such a breeze. So a lot stay back on the older revision client for the ease of use, but they still like the new content so they add it in.

Read full topic
